topic.title: Data Structures
topic.shortdesc: You can use complex data structures such as maps and lists in Couchbase. These data structures may be manipulated with basic operations without retrieving and storing the entire document.

body.p: Data structures in Couchbase are currently an uncommitted feature and are not available in the C SDK. The best way to interoperate with data structures as provided by other Couchbase SDKs is to use either full-document operations or sub-document operations. The section on Sub-Document Operations shows how C applications can manipulate these data structures.
